oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Beth Nielson Chapman - 2018-054-07
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Beth Nielson Chapman from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 7, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beth Nielson Chapman;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (01:16) Opening comments by Sara Lederach along with songwriter introduction / (04:24) Opening comments by Beth / (04:47) Introduction of the first song / (05:18) Performs Strong Enough To Bend / (08:31) Introduces the next song / (10:45) Performs Old Church Hymns And Nursery Rhymes / (14:36) Introduces the next song / (16:45) Performs Sand And Water (with Ernest Chapman) / (21:29) Introduces the next song / (23:09) Performs This Kiss / (25:48) Answers question from the audience about how she got her first song recorded / (27:29) Answers question about creativity and how you unlock that for yourself / (29:12) Answers question about how she finds time to write songs / (30:17) Answers question about her guitar capo / (30:55) Answers question about coming up with melody or words first and creates a song on the spot / (33:38) Answers question about other instruments that she plays / (34:10) Talks about her health struggles and introduces the next song /
(38:44) Performs How We Love / (42:30) Introduces the next song / (43:42) Performs Nothing I Can Do About It Now / (47:16) Final comments / (47:30) Walk-out music / (49:17) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Chapman, Beth Nielson; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
